meanings.definition: To stir (a drink) with a swizzle stick.
meanings.sent1: She was swizzling her lemonade with a small stick.
meanings.sent2: The bartender was swizzling the cocktail before serving it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried swizzling the milk in its bowl with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The wind swizzled the leaves around in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The kids loved watching the tornado swizzling everything in its path.

meanings.sent1: He was swizzling the paint colors to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: The chef was swizzling the ingredients in the pot to make soup.
meanings.sent3: The siblings had a swizzling contest to see who could mix the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The storm swizzled the clouds in the sky, creating a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The DJ was swizzling the music tracks seamlessly during the party.

meanings.sent1: She used a swizzling stick to mix her iced tea.
meanings.sent2: The barista handed out swizzling sticks with the iced coffees.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, followed by a swizzling stick.
meanings.sent4: The artist used a swizzling stick to create unique patterns in the paint.
meanings.sent5: The explorer found an ancient swizzling stick in the ruins.
